title: Sex on the Beach Jell-O® Shots

Ingredients.1: 1 (3 ounce) package cranberry-flavored gelatin mix (such as Jell-O®)

Ingredients.2: 1 (3 ounce) package orange-flavored gelatin mix (such as Jell-O®)

Directions.1: Mix cranberry and orange gelatin together in a heat-proof bowl. Add boiling water and stir until dissolved. Add vodka and peach schnapps and stir. Pour mixture into little cups and chill until set, about 4 hours.
